verses.verse: For <WG1063> every <WG3956> high priest <WG749> taken <WG2983> from among <WG1537> men <WG444> is ordained <WG2525> for <WG5228> men <WG444> in things <WG3588> pertaining to <WG4314> God, <WG2316> that <WG2443> he may offer <WG4374> both <WG5037> gifts <WG1435> and <WG2532> sacrifices <WG2378> for <WG5228> sins: <WG266>

Who can <WG1410> have compassion <WG3356> on the <WG3588> ignorant, <WG50> and <WG2532> on them that are out of the way; <WG4105> for that <WG1893> he <WG846> himself also <WG2532> is compassed with <WG4029> infirmity. <WG769>

And <WG2532> by reason hereof <WG1223> <WG5026> he ought, <WG3784> as <WG2531> for <WG4012> the <WG3588> people, <WG2992> so <WG3779> also <WG2532> for <WG4012> himself, <WG1438> to offer <WG4374> for <WG5228> sins. <WG266>
And <WG2532> no man <WG5100> <WG3756> taketh <WG2983> this honor <WG5092> unto himself, <WG1438> but <WG235> he that is called <WG2564> of <WG5259> God, <WG2316> as <WG2509> was <WG2532> Aaron. <WG2>

So <WG3779> also <WG2532> Christ <WG5547> glorified <WG1392> not <WG3756> himself <WG1438> to be made <WG1096> a high priest; <WG749> but <WG235> he that said <WG2980> unto <WG4314> him, <WG846> Thou <WG4771> art <WG1488> my <WG3450> Son, <WG5207> today <WG4594> have I <WG1473> begotten <WG1080> thee. <WG4571>

As <WG2531> he saith <WG3004> also <WG2532> in <WG1722> another <WG2087> place, Thou <WG4771> art a priest <WG2409> forever <WG1519> <WG165> after <WG2596> the <WG3588> order <WG5010> of Melchizedek. <WG3198>

Who <WG3739> in <WG1722> the <WG3588> days <WG2250> of his <WG848> flesh, <WG4561> when he had offered up <WG4374> <WG5037> prayers <WG1162> and <WG2532> supplications <WG2428> with <WG3326> strong <WG2478> crying <WG2906> and <WG2532> tears <WG1144> unto <WG4314> him that was able <WG1410> to save <WG4982> him <WG846> from <WG1537> death, <WG2288> and <WG2532> was heard <WG1522> in that he feared; <WG575> <WG2124>
Though <WG2539> he were <WG5607> a Son, <WG5207> yet learned <WG3129> he obedience <WG5218> by <WG575> the things which <WG3739> he suffered; <WG3958>
And <WG2532> being made perfect, <WG5048> he became <WG1096> the author <WG159> of eternal <WG166> salvation <WG4991> unto all <WG3956> them that obey <WG5219> him; <WG846>
Called <WG4316> of <WG5259> God <WG2316> a high priest <WG749> after <WG2596> the <WG3588> order <WG5010> of Melchizedek. <WG3198>
Of <WG4012> whom <WG3739> we <WG2254> have many things to say, <WG4183> <WG3056> and <WG2532> hard <WG1421> to be uttered, <WG3004> seeing <WG1893> ye are <WG1096> dull <WG3576> of hearing. <WG189>

For <WG1063> when <WG2532> for <WG1223> the <WG3588> time <WG5550> ye ought <WG3784> to be <WG1511> teachers, <WG1320> ye have <WG2192> need <WG5532> that one teach <WG1321> you <WG5209> again <WG3825> which <WG5101> be the <WG3588> first <WG746> principles <WG4747> of the <WG3588> oracles <WG3051> of God; <WG2316> and <WG2532> are become <WG1096> such as have <WG2192> need <WG5532> of milk, <WG1051> and <WG2532> not <WG3756> of strong meat. <WG4731> <WG5160>
For <WG1063> every one <WG3956> that useth <WG3348> milk <WG1051> is unskillfull <WG552> in the word <WG3056> of righteousness: <WG1343> for <WG1063> he is <WG2076> a babe. <WG3516>

But <WG1161> strong meat <WG4731> <WG5160> belongeth <WG2076> to them that are of full age, <WG5046> even those who by reason of <WG1223> use <WG1838> have <WG2192> their senses <WG145> exercised <WG1128> to <WG4314> discern <WG1253> both <WG5037> good <WG2570> and <WG2532> evil. <WG2556>
